findings.title: Decimals Precision Inconsistency
findings.description: Division of decimal numbers can result in rounding errors due to the way that division is implemented in Solidity.

findings.title: Missing Revert Messages
findings.description: The contract is missing error messages, making it difficult to identify and fix the issue.

findings.title: Transfers Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to set the totalFee to zero, swapping the contractâ€™s tokens to the native currency and sending the swapped amount to the marketingFeeReceiver.

findings.title: Redundant Storage Writes
findings.description: The contract updates variables even if their current state is the same as the one passed as an argument, performing redundant storage writes.

findings.title: Reward Token Change Inconsistency
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to change the distribution token address, which may produce several issues in the distribution process.

findings.title: Missing Check
findings.description: The contract is processing variables that have not been properly sanitized and checked.

findings.title: Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The contract accumulates tokens from the taxes to swap them for ETH, which can result in significant price volatility.

findings.title: Gas Optimization
findings.description: The contract variable `swapThreshold` is used to set a threshold where the contract will trigger the swap functionality, which can be optimized for gas consumption.

findings.title: Potential Transfer Revert Propagation
findings.description: The contract sends funds to certain addresses, which can either be a wallet address or a contract that may revert from incoming payment.

findings.title: Missing Events Emission
findings.description: The contract performs actions and state mutations from external methods that do not result in the emission of events.

findings.title: Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The contract uses the SafeMath library, which is redundant since Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0 have native functionality for arithmetic operations.

findings.title: Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables are declared that their value is initialized once in the constructor and are not modified afterwards, which can be optimized using the immutable keyword.

findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables are declared that can be constants, which can improve gas efficiency.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide, which can impact readability and maintainability.

findings.title: Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract is missing events that are required for arithmetic operations.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Using an uninitialized local variable can lead to unpredictable behavior and potentially cause errors in the contract.

findings.title: Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods are not checked if the result is successful, which can cause issues with the contract's behavior.
